input: What does Section 27 of the IPC define?
target: Section 27 defines property in the possession of a person lawfully, which includes items under their control.
Yes, rented property is considered lawful possession under Section 27.

input: Is borrowed property covered under Section 27?
target: Yes, borrowed property is included if it is in lawful possession.

input: Does Section 27 apply to stolen goods?
target: No, stolen goods are not considered lawfully possessed under Section 27.

input: Does Section 27 include property held by agents?
target: Yes, property held by agents on behalf of someone is included under Section 27.
